properties.areaDesc: DeSoto, MS; Crittenden, AR; Shelby, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 10:26AM CST until February 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Mississippi River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at Memphis
* from Wednesday February 19 until Wednesday February 26.
* At 10 AM Wednesday the stage was 33.8 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 34.5 feet on Friday February 21.
* Flood stage is 34.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Wednesday February 19 and
continue to rise to near 34.5 feet by Friday February 21.The river
will fall below flood stage by Wednesday February 26.
* At 34.0 feet...In Arkansas, the camp on Robinson Road right inside
the levee is totally flooded. Roads to industries inside the levee
south of West Memphis are flooding.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
